meanings.definition: The bony structure in the lower part of the trunk of many vertebrates, consisting of the hip bones, sacrum, and coccyx; the skeleton of the pelvis.
meanings.sent1: The pelves provide support for the body and protect internal organs.

meanings.sent5: The pelves of the ancient mammoth were massive and imposing.
